nodes.text: The Outer Rim Alliance was an organization formed in 25 ABY to defend the Outer Rim from the Yuuzhan Vong.

The organization was created following the Battle of Shramar highlighted the inability of the New Republic to defend distant worlds. It was formed by escapees from the battle who had gathered in Wild Space. The four main components of the organization were:
The journalist Cianba also journeyed with the Alliance.
